steps.title: Create a WordPress website
steps.description: With the WordPress Toolkit you create your WordPress website easily within minutes. The toolkit allows enabling a variety of development workflows for WordPress admins and developers of all skill levels, from beginners to pros. Install or import your first WordPress website now!

steps.title: Create mailboxes and folders with Plesk Premium Email
steps.description:
Let's activate advanced email and collaboration services with Plesk Premium Email.

Plesk Premium Email is powered by Kolab, the most popular fully-featured Open Source secure mail and collaboration server. It provides all the features associated with top tier collaboration servers, such as email, calendar, contacts, tasks, notes and files.

steps.title: Add an SSL certificate and secure your website
steps.description: Create an SSL certificate with the help of the Security Advisor.

steps.title: Optimize your website with Google PageSpeed Insights
steps.description: Check your business website with Google PageSpeed Insights and boost your website performance with Google PageSpeed for Apache.
